example.eg: I'm a careful driver.  If you want to chop the vegetables, you'll need to be careful; the knife is very sharp.
example.egtrans: 我开车很小心。如果你要切菜，一定要小心些，刀很利，不要切到自己了。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 小心的, 谨慎的, 仔细的

dsense.name: careful to do [sth], careful about doing [sth]

example.eg: He is careful about locking the doors before he goes out.
example.egtrans: 出门前，他小心地锁好了门。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 小心做…的, 对…很谨慎

example.eg: His movements were careful as he stalked the prey.
example.egtrans: 跟踪猎物时，他的动作谨小慎微。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 仔细的, 谨慎的, 深思熟虑的

example.eg: He oversaw a careful review of the evidence.
example.egtrans: 他一丝不苟地检查了证据。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 仔细的, 细致的, 一丝不苟的

example.eg: Be careful! You don't know what's out there!
example.egtrans: 小心！你不知道外面有什么！

dsense.name: Be careful what you wish for.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 要慎重许愿。，别轻易许愿。

dsense.name: take a close look, take a careful look

example.eg: If you take a close look, you'll see that  this banknote has no watermark - it's a forgery.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 仔细检查, 仔细查看

dsense.name: take a close look at [sth/sb], take a careful look at [sth/sb]

example.eg: Before buying a used car, I take a careful look at the engine.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 仔细检查, 仔细查看
